project_context.name: DeepSentinel
project_context.description: Autonomous AI agent platform for DeFi arbitrage on Sui blockchain.
project_context.target_audience: DeFi traders, Crypto enthusiasts, Tech-savvy investors

usage_rules.headings: Use Chivo for all H1-H3. Tight tracking (-0.02em). Bold or Black weights.
usage_rules.body: Use Manrope for UI text. Relaxed line-height (1.6).
usage_rules.code: Use JetBrains Mono for all financial data, logs, hash addresses, and 'Agent Status' terminal views.
usage_rules.uppercase: Use Uppercase + Wide Spacing for labels (e.g., 'TOTAL PROFIT', 'ACTIVE AGENTS').

marketing.hero_style: Full height, centered text but asymmetric background elements.

dashboard.card_style: Cardless look or subtle glass cards. 1px borders. No shadows.

buttons.primary: Sharp edges or minimal rounded-md. High contrast. Hover: Glow effect.
buttons.secondary: Outline with glass background. Hover: fill-white/10.
buttons.connect_wallet: Special status. Use 'Sui Brand' color or Gradient Border.

charts.style: Minimal axes. Gradients for area fills. Neon strokes.

activity_feed.style: Terminal/Console aesthetic. Monospace font. Green/Red text for trade execution logs.

textures.noise: Overlay a subtle noise texture on the background (opacity 0.03) to reduce banding.

effects.glow: Use drop-shadow for text and box-shadow for active states.
effects.scanlines: Optional: very subtle scanline overlay for the 'Live Activity' section.

rules: Staggered entrance for all list items.

universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles (pill or sharp).
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
instructions_to_main_agent: Read this JSON. Install the fonts. Configure Tailwind with the 'Deep Ocean' palette. Build the Landing Page with the Tetris Grid and the Dashboard with the Bento Grid. Use the provided image URLs. Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid.
